title: Operation Fortune: Ruse de Guerre
description: يُجنّد العميل السري أورسون فورتيون فريقًا من العملاء لتعقب بيع سلاح تكنولوجي جديد مهدد للعالم، وينضم إليهم نجم سينمائي في مهمة خطيرة.
cast: Jason Statham, Aubrey Plaza, Hugh Grant

title: Bullet Train
description: Five assassins aboard a fast-moving bullet train find out their missions have something in common, leading to chaos, comedy, and brutal action along the way.
cast: Brad Pitt, Joey King, Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Brian Tyree Henry

title: 365 Days: This Day
description: Laura and Massimo are back and hotter than ever. But the reunited couple's new beginning is complicated by Massimo's family ties and a mysterious man who enters Laura's life to win her heart and trust, at any cost.
cast: Anna-Maria Sieklucka, Michele Morrone, Simone Susinna, Magdalena Lamparska

title: Mission Cross
description: A pastor and a police officer team up to take down a notorious gang leader in a thrilling mission packed with action, betrayal, and divine justice.
cast: Odunlade Adekola, Femi Adebayo, Bimbo Ademoye

title: Midway
description: The story of the Battle of Midway, told by the leaders and the sailors who fought it. A pivotal WWII clash between the American fleet and the Imperial Japanese Navy, marking a turning point in the Pacific Theater.
cast: Ed Skrein, Patrick Wilson, Woody Harrelson, Luke Evans, Mandy Moore, Dennis Quaid

title: Scream VI (2023) - Ghostface Returns in a Brutal New Chapter
description: In Scream VI (2023), the survivors of the Ghostface massacre escape to New York City for a new beginning. But peace doesn't last long — a more ruthless, terrifying Ghostface emerges, turning the city into a bloody playground. Full of suspense, twists, and horror, this chilling sequel takes the slasher franchise to new heights.
cast: Melissa Barrera, Jenna Ortega, Courteney Cox, Jasmin Savoy Brown, Mason Gooding, Hayden Panettiere

title: Alanis (2017) - A Powerful Argentinian Drama About Survival and Motherhood
description: Alanis (2017) is a raw and emotional Argentinian drama that follows a young mother and sex worker fighting to survive in Buenos Aires. With a stunning performance by Sofía Gala Castiglione, the film explores themes of resilience, motherhood, and social inequality in a deeply personal and realistic way.
cast: Sofía Gala Castiglione, Dana Basso, Silvina Sabater, Santiago Pedrero

title: Below Her Mouth (2016) – A Bold Lesbian Romance That Redefines Desire
description: Below Her Mouth (2016) is a provocative Canadian romantic drama that follows an unexpected weekend affair between two women—Jasmine, a fashion editor, and Dallas, a roofer. Told through a female gaze, the film explores raw passion, emotional vulnerability, and sexual liberation in one of the boldest LGBTQ+ films of the decade.
cast: Erika Linder, Natalie Krill, Sebastian Pigott, Mayko Nguyen

title: The Hitman's Bodyguard (2017) – Explosive Action Comedy Starring Ryan Reynolds & Samuel L. Jackson
description: The Hitman's Bodyguard (2017) is a high-octane action-comedy about Michael Bryce, a top-tier bodyguard, assigned to protect hitman Darius Kincaid as he testifies against a ruthless dictator. Packed with non-stop action, hilarious banter, and wild chase scenes, this buddy film delivers thrills and laughs in equal measure.
cast: Ryan Reynolds, Samuel L. Jackson, Gary Oldman, Salma Hayek, Elodie Yung

title: Palm Springs (2020) – A Time-Loop Romantic Comedy Like No Other
description: Palm Springs (2020) is a hilarious and heartfelt romantic sci-fi comedy about two wedding guests stuck in an endless time loop. Starring Andy Samberg and Cristin Milioti, this Sundance hit delivers a clever twist on love, fate, and living in the moment—with sharp humor and emotional depth.
cast: Andy Samberg, Cristin Milioti, J.K. Simmons, Peter Gallagher, Meredith Hagner

title: The Northman (2022) – A Brutal Viking Epic of Vengeance and Destiny
description: The Northman (2022) is a visually stunning Viking revenge saga directed by Robert Eggers. Starring Alexander Skarsgård, Anya Taylor-Joy, and Nicole Kidman, the film follows a young prince on a blood-soaked quest to avenge his father’s murder. Packed with Norse mythology, intense battles, and haunting visuals, this epic redefines historical action cinema.
cast: Alexander Skarsgård, Anya Taylor-Joy, Nicole Kidman, Claes Bang, Ethan Hawke, Willem Dafoe

title: Our Times (2025) – Mexican Sci‑Fi Romance Time‑Loop on Netflix
description: Our Times (2025), a Mexican sci‑fi romance directed by Chava Cartas, follows physicists Nora and Héctor as they accidentally travel from 1966 to 2025. Starring Lucero and Benny Ibarra, this Netflix hit combines time‑travel charm, gender dynamics, and emotional depth, ranking in the U.S. top 10—stream it now!
cast: Lucero, Benny Ibarra, Renata Vaca, Ofelia Medina
